articles.description: Director Chris McKay and star J.K. Simmons talk about creating the next sci-fi time travel epic, The Tomorrow War, and the need to consider roads best left untaken.
articles.content: I wanted the aliens to feel ancient, so that had to do with texture, explains McKay. That had to do with flakiness and nicks and marks, just details in their flesh. I wanted them to feel hungry, so I… [+2316 chars]
